items.name: Venus
items.des: Venus Protocol is a fast, low cost, decentralized lending platform that lives on the BNB Chain. At its core, Venus is a money market protocol that enables lenders to provide loans to generate vield on their tokens and borrowers to take out loans using $XVS and a variety of other currencies as collateral.
